title: Wiring
details: I can do electrical wiring of your house or office. I also can fix your damage wiring. During wiring I always follow local building regulations. On the wiring job it also includes connecting lights/fans. At first I draw the wiring diagram. Then I do the wiring.

title: Troubleshoot
details: Troubleshooting is a very important task. During trobleshooting I follow some steps. Like, gather the information, understand the malfunction, identify the source of the problem, repair the component, verify the repair.

title: Install Appliances
details: During installing a appliance I always maintain top class safety. Because you spend a lot of money to buy any appliance. It's my job to respect your hard earned money.

title: Replace Components
details: I can replace or repair your damage components. I can do these tasks within a very short time.

title: Maintenance System
details: After installing any electrical or electronics components it needs maintenance. I can do these task regularly. Whenever you call me I will always there.

title: Inspecting Components
details: After install or repair any components it's really important to inspect. By inspection I can verify that the component is working fine.
